title: Given what a film friendly city Wilmington is, I am suprised by the lack of movie theaters here that play independent films. Will there ever be a film house that will provide Wilmington residents an opportunity to see these films on the big screen or is there a way to convince the two movie theaters already here to add these films to their repetoire? A lot of there films go one to win many coveted awards and yet Wilmingtonians are forced to watch them when their are finally released to video and not on the big screen as intended.
